mapper.select: SELECT s.sku_idx AS skuIdx, s.skutype_idx AS skuTypeIdx, s.sku_name AS skuName, s.sku_cost AS skuCost, s.sku_barcode AS skuBarcode, p.promotion_idx as promotionIdx FROM sku AS s INNER JOIN sku_promotion AS p ON s.sku_idx = p.sku_idx limit #{limit}

SELECT s.sku_idx AS skuIdx, s.skutype_idx AS skuTypeIdx, s.sku_name AS skuName, s.sku_cost AS skuCost, s.sku_barcode AS skuBarcode, p.promotion_idx AS promotionIdx FROM sku AS s INNER JOIN sku_promotion AS p ON s.sku_idx = p.sku_idx WHERE skutype_idx >= #{skutypeIdx} AND skutype_idx < #{skutypeIdx} + 1000 limit #{limit}
